item.title: GF Amercians
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

 Oh boy, this topic again. Some of the highly misinformed 12 year olds shouldn't be allowed to comment, or at least should be quickly addressed on their opinions. Anyway, we all have our own opinions. That's just how life is going to be. You can't get everyone to agree with you. Some think war is right, others think it's wrong. Some thing Christianity is the answer, others thing Judaism is. Some feel killing is right, some think it's wrong. That's how things are going to be. For every black there is a white, for every positive a negative.  
 Also, the title of the topic 'GF Americans...' seemed like a poor choice of title. Sure, Obama hasn't made the greatest decisions in the world. But is he trying to hurt the country? Not at all. Sure, we're in debt, but by the numbers, the economy is on a rise. He's only doing his job to make it better. Do I agree with his methods? No, but as I said before, forever right, there is a left. This topic is HIGHLY opinionated, it could go many ways.

Anyway, this should be locked. To many things can branch of the base topic, and it’s probably going to turn into a troll fest soon.

Read full topic

item.title: GF Amercians
item.dc:creator: @Gazascape Gazascape
item.description:
@Gazascape wrote:

Let me get this straight…

Muslims aren’t terrorists neither is it the other way round.

Terrorism is an organization not a religion. Muslims just have very bad people, which ruins their image. Believe it or not when Osama was killed, all arab countries were happy! Now he’s dead over the next generations muslims will get a better look, Or until al-kayeeda is destroyed.

About Palestine, It belonged to the Palestinians, then Britain needed USA to help them in WWII, so the Jews made them a deal, they’d have America pair up if Britain gave the Jews the land of Palestine. And at the time Palestine was under peaceful control of the British. So the British allowed thousands of Immigrants to be shipped away from the UK to Palestine in order to keep safe from Hitler. And till today Israeli’s are treating the Palestinians badly. Israel is Illegal towards both International Law and the UN. This year 2011 Palestinian doctors had to cancel thousands of operations due to the lack of medical supplies and medicines needed such as… Anesthetic.

item.title: GF Amercians
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Vic_, post:186, topic:393549”][quote author=usama299 link=topic=490717.msg3593716#msg3593716 date=1304871622]

Obama is not Muslim. They only allow the Catholic religion for presidents.

The United States Constitution states that “no religious test shall ever be required as a qualification to any office or public trust under the United States”, so stating that the president has to be Catholic is false.

Well I guess it must be catholic school propaganda just to keepyou catholic, they always taught us only Catholics can become presidents.

I got to a catholic school, and I’ve never been told that…

I guess my schools unique. It gives us another reason for being catholic… “Be catholic, or else you can’t be president.” I guess it might have been a joke and I took it the wrong way

I thought there have only been like 2 catholic presidents

You can be a president… doesn’t matter what’s your religion…
[/quote]

Pretty sure they don’t let muslim terrorists be president. Allah Allah, no fuck Allah.[/quote]

I thought we established that being muslim doesn’t automatically imply terrorism?

Read full topic
